task.title: Invite Contacts on Conference Panel
task.shortdesc: You can invite contacts to join a conference on the Conference Panel.

step.cmd: On the Conference Panel, choose a conference, and click .
Click Open Contacts to open your contact group.
Click Add to add an individual contact.
Select the desired contacts, click Invite Selected.
step.stepresult: The PBX will call the invited contacts. If the contacts answer the call, they will join the conference.
